data.description_html:
This spell causes the subject's face to appear horrible and terrifying.
You can create nearly any combination of hideous features—blue skin, parrot face, elephantine nose, rotting tusks, or anything else you can imagine.
You can not duplicate the appearance of any known creature, however.
Creatures—excluding you and your allies—who view the recipient must make successful Will saving throws or become shaken.
Shaken creatures suffer a -2 morale penalty on attack rolls, weapon damage rolls, and saving throws.
Material Component: A miniature palette dotted with paints of assorted colors.
data.name: Apparition
